name: Pillow Hero
description:
Enter Harold, a hapless sleepwalker who always end up waking in the wrong room in the middle of the night. Guide him through various obstacles as he carries his pillow to his bed to sleep.

Gameplay Features

  • Guide Harold through an arcade-style level based system of maps.
  • "One Pack Hero" - No overpowered characters and unlimited inventory. Now, Harold can only carry ONE item at a time!
  • Use items that are scattered on every level to beat the map. Picking up an item will discard your most recent one!
  • Simple turn-based movement and combat.
  • Clever traps and puzzles with fog of war.
  • Each level is saved at map start, so when Harold screws up, he can restart the level.
  • "Highscores" system. The top ten scores will be recorded in the Hall of Fame. Check the current highscores at the title screen.

UPDATE V. 0.5

  • Added 2 new world types with 10 new levels, bringing in new puzzle mechanics to play with.
  • Updated splash art.
  • New and changed sfx and bgm.
  • Various bugfixes.
